title: adding account manually
content: In the newest release of Thunderbird 143.0.1, there is no way to add a mail account manually. You have done something in the newest version that does not match any of your online helps. Please tell me the secret process that matches what I see as I use the new release
creator: airmorris9

title: Merging duplicates in address book
content: How can I merge duplicate contacts in Address Book?
creator: janeandstevep

title: Sent items don't show in 'sent folder'
content:
Since awhile while, the items I send, don';t show up in the sent folder of that account. The complete folder is empty, which means that I also lost messages. I didn't make any changes to the settings, it might have happened due to an update maybe?

My other accounts work still fine. I checked all settings I could think of that might affect it, but haven't found a solution. I'm getting pretty desperate and hope someone can help me out.

It's an IMAP account. I've selected the 'sent folder' in subscribed. 'When sending messages, automatically' the 'place a copy in' is checked and directed to the email address. Also tried it with checking 'other' and select email address. I also just tried to 'local folder', but nothing happens.

I hope my description is fine. If more info is needed to tackle this problem, I like to hear!
creator: info13041

title: Thunderbirdportable lost all data after updrading to 140.3

title: Thunderbird freezes often
content: Dear ∀, My Thunderbird on Mint often freezes. How can I find the problem source? Is there a guideline for this? You can find my system information at https://termbin.com/s0hx The (slightly modified) output of Hilfe→Informationen zur Fehlerbehebung can be found at https://c.gmx.net/@357082100660175185/U-IvRdfnd1PpRzQdi7Pyxg until 2026-09-26. Thank you in advance for your help.
creator: knurz

title: Problem for sending mails with your last versio released on September 23rd
content: Hello Since I installed your last version of Thunderbird, I cannot send e-mails, or only by saving the mail as "unsent" and restarting the program. It get sent it then, but I have to do this for each mail. Do you a way to fix this serious issue? Thank you very much
creator: patricia.bassereau

title: odeslaná pošta
content: Ahoj, dneska jsem zjistila že na doméně kde máme e-mail se změnily účty přijaté/odeslané pošty. Ok tak jsem to změnila v Thunderbirdu a přijatá pošta zůstala, ale úplně mi zmizela složka "odeslaná pošta". Ikdyž teď odešlu e-mail sice dorazí kam má, ale nikde v Thunderbirdu prostě neexistuje složka "odeslaná pošta" kde bych tam e-mail viděla - trochu s děsem čekám že mi řeknete že o staré odeslaná e-maily jsem přišla, ale jak alespoň zobrazit složku "odeslaný email"?? Když si dám "zobrazení" zaškrtala jsem tam všechno a k tomuhle účtu se mi prostě složka "odeslaná pošta" neukáže. Já se omlouvám nejsem IT jsem obyčejný uživatel a snad pochopíte o co mi jde
creator: lenka.hnizdilova
